title: Redefining Conversations and Enhancing User experience
description: Throughout your customer's entire buying journey. Rotar AI allows you to deligth them at every sep of the way, from their first visit to the final purchase.
subtitle: Engage
descriptionDiv: Reach out to visitors proactively using personalized chatbot greetings. Turn website visits into sales opportunities.
descriptionDiv2: Lead customers to a sale through recommended purchases and tailored offerings.
descriptionDiv3: Generate and qualify prospects automatically. Transfer high-intent leads to your sales reps in real time to shorten the sales cycle.
